articles.title: Ukraine-Russia live news: WW2 being repeated, Zelenskyy says
articles.description: Ukraine’s president laments WW2 repeating on the anniversary of Hitler’s surprise attacks on the Soviet Union.
articles.content: • Ukraines President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says Russia did the same when it invaded Ukraine on February 24 as Hitler when he launched surprised attacks on the Soviet Union on June 22, 1941
